ResearchProjectDef.label: Crude Limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic, uncomfortable, and ineffective, but better than nothing. Can now craft shoddy limb replacements at a Crafting Spot.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Artificial Limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Still quite unrefined, but better than the shoddy limbs that came before. Artificial limbs can now be crafted at a Crafting Spot.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechanical Limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Intricately crafted limbs with many pulleys and gears. While these are a great improvement, the mechanics of the human body are tough to reproduce. Mechanical limbs can be crafted at a Fueled Smithy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Paresian Limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Incredible engineering and craftmanship utilized in tangent have allowed for elegant limbs that are on par with natural limbs. Quite time and resource expensive. Paresian limbs can be crafted at a Fueled Smithy.
